thread.title: Back To The Eighties Masquerade Dance Party
thread.title_full: Back To The Eighties Masquerade Dance Party - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Back To The Eighties Masquerade Dance Party
text:
Caption Back to the 80's Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See Back to the 80's Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries The Mark Twain House and Museum hosted a time travel themed party, Saturday night, Oct. 24. The "Back to the Eighties Masquerade Dance Party!" mashed together an 1890's masquerade ball into a 1980's dance party! The event featured live 80's cover music, a costume contest, and a time travelers dance off.
Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant
